product_name: Black Diamond / Pieps Sport Avalanche Safety Set
long_description: This set includes essentials for seasoned backcountry skiers or someone taking an Avalanche 101 class. It includes a Pieps DSP Sport Transceiver, a Transfer 3 Shovel and a 280cm QuickDraw Tour Probe.
short_description: This set includes essentials for seasoned backcountry skiers or someone taking an Avalanche 101 class. It includes a Pieps DSP Sport Transceiver, a Transfer 3 Shovel and a 280cm QuickDraw Tour Probe.
